mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id, t.parent_task_id, t.title, t.content, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.status FROM task t LEFT JOIN task_relation tr on t.task_id = tr.task_id WHERE tr.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_relation (task_id, user_id, group_id) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{userId}, #{groupId})
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET parent_task_id = #{task.parentTaskId}, title = #{task.title}, content = #{task.content}, start_date = #{task.startDate}, end_date = #{task.endDate}, status = #{task.status}, updated_by = #{userId} WHERE task_id = #{task.taskId}
